00038 #define __minimum(a,b)(((a)<(b))?(a):(b))
00039 #define __maximum(a,b)(((a)>(b))?(a):(b))

00071 // Empty the data and free the memory allocation.
00072 void AffxByteArray::empty()
00073 {
00074         setSize(0);
00075 
00076         // shrink to nothing
00077         delete[] (char*)m_pData;
00078         m_pData = NULL;
00079         m_nSize = m_nMaxSize = 0;
00080         m_nSize = 0;
00081 }
00082 
00083 // Clear the data without freeing the memory allocation.
00084 void AffxByteArray::clear()
00085 {
00086         removeAt(0, m_nSize);
00087 }

00090 {
00091         m_pData = NULL;
00092         m_nSize = m_nMaxSize = m_nGrowBy = 0;
00093 
00094         m_bLocked = false;
00095 }

00097 AffxByteArray::AffxByteArray(const AffxByteArray& ba)
00098 {
00099         int iLength = ba.getSize();
00100         m_nSize = m_nMaxSize = iLength;
00101         m_nGrowBy = 0;
00102         m_bLocked = false;
00103 
00104 //      m_pData = (char*) new char[iLength * sizeof(char)];
00105         m_pData = (char*) new char[iLength];
00106         memcpy(m_pData, ba.m_pData, (iLength * sizeof(char)));
00107 }

00109 AffxByteArray::AffxByteArray(const AffxString& str)
00110 {
00111         AffxString str1 = str;
00112         int iLength = (int)str1.length();
00113         m_nSize = m_nMaxSize = iLength;
00114         m_nGrowBy = 0;
00115         m_bLocked = false;
00116 
00117         m_pData = (char*) new char[iLength * sizeof(char)];
00118         for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < str1.length()); iIndex++)
00119         {
00120                 m_pData[iIndex] = (char)str1.charAt(iIndex);
00121         }
00122 //      memcpy(m_pData, ba.m_pData, (iLength * sizeof(char)));
00123 }

00130 void AffxByteArray::setSize(int nNewSize, int nGrowBy)
00131 {
00132         // If locked do not reduce the size of the allocation.
00133         if (m_bLocked)
00134         {
00135                 m_nSize = nNewSize;
00136 
00137                 return;
00138         }
00139 
00140         if (nGrowBy != -1)
00141                 m_nGrowBy = nGrowBy;  // set new size
00142 
00143         if (nNewSize == 0)
00144         {
00145                 // shrink to nothing
00146 //              delete[] (char*)m_pData;
00147 //              m_pData = NULL;
00148 //              m_nSize = m_nMaxSize = 0;
00149                 m_nSize = 0;
00150         }
00151         else if (m_pData == NULL)
00152         {
00153                 // create one with exact size
00154                 m_pData = (char*) new char[nNewSize * sizeof(char)];
00155 
00156                 memset(m_pData, 0, nNewSize * sizeof(char));  // zero fill
00157 
00158                 m_nSize = m_nMaxSize = nNewSize;
00159         }
00160         else if (nNewSize <= m_nMaxSize)
00161         {
00162                 // it fits
00163                 if (nNewSize > m_nSize)
00164                 {
00165                         // initialize the new elements
00166 
00167                         memset(&m_pData[m_nSize], 0, (nNewSize-m_nSize) * sizeof(char));
00168 
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 m_nSize = nNewSize;
00172         }
00173         else
00174         {
00175                 // otherwise, grow array
00176                 int nGrowBy = m_nGrowBy;
00177                 if (nGrowBy == 0)
00178                 {
00179                         // heuristically determine growth when nGrowBy == 0
00180                         //  (this avoids heap fragmentation in many situations)
00181                         nGrowBy = __minimum(1024, __maximum(4, m_nSize / 8));
00182                 }
00183                 int nNewMax;
00184                 if (nNewSize < m_nMaxSize + nGrowBy)
00185                         nNewMax = m_nMaxSize + nGrowBy;  // granularity
00186                 else
00187                         nNewMax = nNewSize;  // no slush
00188 
00189                 char* pNewData = (char*) new char[nNewMax * sizeof(char)];
00190 
00191                 // copy new data from old
00192                 memcpy(pNewData, m_pData, m_nSize * sizeof(char));
00193 
00194                 // construct remaining elements
00195 
00196                 memset(&pNewData[m_nSize], 0, (nNewSize-m_nSize) * sizeof(char));
00197 
00198 
00199                 // get rid of old stuff (note: no destructors called)
00200                 delete[] (char*)m_pData;
00201                 m_pData = pNewData;
00202                 m_nSize = nNewSize;
00203                 m_nMaxSize = nNewMax;
00204         }
00205 }
00206 
00207 int AffxByteArray::append(const AffxString& srcIn)
00208 {
00209         AffxString src = srcIn;
00210 
00211         int nOldSize = m_nSize;
00212         setSize(m_nSize + (int)src.length());
00213 
00214         memcpy(m_pData + nOldSize, src.c_str(), src.length() * sizeof(char));
00215 
00216         return nOldSize;
00217 }

00223         setSize(m_nSize + src.m_nSize);
00224 
00225         memcpy(m_pData + nOldSize, src.m_pData, src.m_nSize * sizeof(char));
00226 
00227         return nOldSize;
00228 }

00230 void AffxByteArray::copy(const AffxByteArray& src)
00231 {
00232         setSize(src.m_nSize);
00233 
00234         memmove(m_pData, src.m_pData, src.m_nSize * sizeof(char));
00235

00238 void AffxByteArray::freeExtra()
00239 {
00240         if (m_bLocked)
00241                 return;
00242 
00243         if (m_nSize != m_nMaxSize)
00244         {
00245                 // shrink to desired size
00246                 char* pNewData = NULL;
00247                 if (m_nSize != 0)
00248                 {
00249                         pNewData = (char*) new char[m_nSize * sizeof(char)];
00250                         // copy new data from old
00251                         memcpy(pNewData, m_pData, m_nSize * sizeof(char));
00252                 }
00253 
00254                 // get rid of old stuff (note: no destructors called)
00255                 delete[] (char*)m_pData;
00256                 m_pData = pNewData;
00257                 m_nMaxSize = m_nSize;
00258         }
00259 }

00263 void AffxByteArray::setAtGrow(int nIndex, char newElement)
00264 {
00265         if (nIndex >= m_nSize)
00266                 setSize(nIndex+1);
00267         m_pData[nIndex] = newElement;
00268 }
00269 
00270 void AffxByteArray::insertAt(int nIndex, char newElement, int nCount)
00271 {
00272         if (nIndex >= m_nSize)
00273         {
00274                 // adding after the end of the array
00275                 setSize(nIndex + nCount);  // grow so nIndex is valid
00276         }
00277         else
00278         {
00279                 // inserting in the middle of the array
00280                 int nOldSize = m_nSize;
00281                 setSize(m_nSize + nCount);  // grow it to new size
00282                 // shift old data up to fill gap
00283                 memmove(&m_pData[nIndex+nCount], &m_pData[nIndex],
00284                         (nOldSize-nIndex) * sizeof(char));
00285 
00286                 // re-init slots we copied from
00287 
00288                 memset(&m_pData[nIndex], 0, nCount * sizeof(char));
00289 
00290         }
00291 
00292         // insert new m_pData in the gap
00293         while (nCount--)
00294                 m_pData[nIndex++] = newElement;
00295 }
00296 
00297 void AffxByteArray::removeAt(int nIndex, int nCount)
00298 {
00299         // just remove a range
00300         int nMoveCount = m_nSize - (nIndex + nCount);
00301 
00302         if (nMoveCount)
00303                 memcpy(&m_pData[nIndex], &m_pData[nIndex + nCount],
00304                         nMoveCount * sizeof(char));
00305         m_nSize -= nCount;
00306 }
00307 
00308 void AffxByteArray::insertAt(int nStartIndex, AffxByteArray* pNewArray)
00309 {
00310         if (pNewArray->getSize() > 0)
00311         {
00312                 insertAt(nStartIndex, pNewArray->getAt(0), pNewArray->getSize());
00313                 for (int i = 0; i < pNewArray->getSize(); i++)
00314                         setAt(nStartIndex + i, pNewArray->getAt(i));
00315         }
00316 }

00318 // Assignment operator.
00319 const AffxByteArray& AffxByteArray::operator=(const AffxByteArray& ba)
00320 {
00321     if (this == &ba)
00322         return *this;
00323 
00324         empty();
00325         setSize(ba.getSize());
00326         copy(0, ba, 0, ba.getSize());
00327         return *this;
00328 }

00330 bool AffxByteArray::operator==(const AffxByteArray &ba)
00331 {
00332         bool bEqual = false;
00333 
00334         int iThisSize = getSize();
00335         int iThatSize = ba.getSize();
00336 
00337         if (iThisSize == iThatSize)
00338         {
00339                 for (int i = 0; (i < iThisSize); i++)
00340                 {
00341                         if (getAt(i) == ba.getAt(i))
00342                                 bEqual = true;
00343                         else
00344                         {
00345                                 bEqual = false;
00346                                 break;
00347                         }
00348                 }
00349         }
00350 
00351         return bEqual;
00352 }

00354 bool AffxByteArray::equals(const AffxString &str)
00355 {
00356         bool bEqual = false;
00357 
00358         int iThisSize = getSize();
00359         int iThatSize = (int)str.length();
00360 
00361         if (iThisSize == iThatSize)
00362         {
00363                 if ((iThisSize == 0) && (iThatSize == 0)) {bEqual = true;}
00364                 else
00365                 {
00366                         for (int i = 0; (i < iThisSize); i++)
00367                         {
00368                                 if (getAt(i) == str.getAt(i))
00369                                         bEqual = true;
00370                                 else
00371                                 {
00372                                         bEqual = false;
00373                                         break;
00374                                 }
00375                         }
00376                 }
00377         }
00378 
00379         return bEqual;
00380 }

00382 bool AffxByteArray::equalsIgnoreCase(const AffxString &str)
00383 {
00384         bool bEqual = false;
00385 
00386         int iThisSize = getSize();
00387         int iThatSize = (int)str.length();
00388 
00389         if (iThisSize == iThatSize)
00390         {
00391                 for (int i = 0; (i < iThisSize); i++)
00392                 {
00393                         if (getAt(i) >= 'A' && getAt(i) <= 'Z')
00394                         {
00395                                 if ((getAt(i) == str.getAt(i)) || (getAt(i) + ' ' == str.getAt(i)))
00396                                         bEqual = true;
00397                                 else
00398                                 {
00399                                         bEqual = false;
00400                                         break;
00401                                 }
00402                         }
00403                         else if (getAt(i) >= 'a' && getAt(i) <= 'z')
00404                         {
00405                                 if ((getAt(i) == str.getAt(i)) || (getAt(i) - ' ' == str.getAt(i)))
00406                                         bEqual = true;
00407                                 else
00408                                 {
00409                                         bEqual = false;
00410                                         break;
00411                                 }
00412                         }
00413                         else if (getAt(i) == str.getAt(i))
00414                                 bEqual = true;
00415                         else
00416                         {
00417                                 bEqual = false;
00418                                 break;
00419                         }
00420                 }
00421         }
00422 
00423         return bEqual;
00424 }

00426 int AffxByteArray::getInt(int &iIndex)
00427 {
00428         char buffer[64];
00429         short i = 0;
00430         int iSize = getSize();
00431 
00432         while ((iIndex < iSize) && (i < 63) && (isdigit(getAt(iIndex))))
00433         {
00434                 buffer[i] = (char)(getAt(iIndex));
00435                 iIndex++;
00436                 i++;
00437         }
00438         buffer[i] = '\0';
00439 
00440         return atol(buffer);
00441 }

00443 void AffxByteArray::copy(int iDestStart, const AffxByteArray& src, int iSrcStart, int iLength)
00444 {
00445         if (getSize() < (iDestStart + iLength))
00446                 setSize(iDestStart + iLength);
00447 
00448         memmove((m_pData + iDestStart), (src.m_pData + iSrcStart), (iLength * sizeof(char)));
00449 }

00451 // Read one line from the byte array into a StringBuffer object.
00452 void AffxByteArray::setOffset(int iOffset) {m_iOffset = iOffset;}
00453 bool AffxByteArray::getLine(AffxByteArray& ba) 
00454 {        
00455         bool bSuccessful = false;
00456         int iLength = 0;
00457         ba.setSize(255);
00458         int iStart = m_iOffset;
00459         int iIndex = m_iOffset;
00460         
00461         if (getSize() > 0)
00462         {
00463             int i = 0;
00464             int iLast = 0;
00465             
00466             while ((iIndex < getSize()) && ((i = (int)getAt(iIndex)) != 10))
00467             {
00468                 iIndex++;
00469                 iLast = i;
00470             }
00471             
00472             iLength = iIndex - iStart;
00473             m_iOffset = m_iOffset + iLength + 1;
00474          
00475             if ((iIndex >= getSize()) && (iLength == 0))
00476             {
00477                 ba.setSize(0);
00478             }
00479             else
00480             {   
00481                 bSuccessful = true;
00482                 
00483                 if ((i == 10) && (iLast == 13))
00484                 {
00485                     if (iLength > 0)
00486                         iLength--;
00487                 }
00488                 
00489                 ba.setSize(iLength);
00490                 ba.copy(0, *this, iStart, iLength);
00491             }
00492         }
00493         
00494     return bSuccessful;
00495 }

00497 // Count the number of columns separeted by tab characters.
00498 int AffxByteArray::getColumnCount()
00499 {
00500         int iColumnCount = 1;
00501         
00502         for (int i = 0; (i < getSize()); i++)
00503         {
00504             if (getAt(i) == 9)
00505             {
00506                 iColumnCount++;
00507             }           
00508         }
00509         
00510         return iColumnCount;
00511 }
00512 
00513 // Get the column m_pData.
00514 AffxByteArray& AffxByteArray::getColumn(int iColumnNumber, AffxByteArray& ba)
00515 {
00516         if (iColumnNumber == 0)
00517         {
00518             ba.setSize(0);
00519             return ba;
00520         }
00521         
00522         int iColumnCount = 1;
00523         int iStart = 0;
00524         int iLength = 0;
00525         
00526         for (int i = 0; (i < getSize()); i++)
00527         {
00528             if (getAt(i) == 9)
00529             {
00530                 iColumnCount++;
00531                 if (iColumnCount == iColumnNumber)
00532                 {
00533                     iStart = i + 1;
00534                     continue;
00535                 }
00536             }
00537             
00538             if (iColumnCount > iColumnNumber)
00539                 break;
00540             else if (iColumnCount == iColumnNumber)
00541                 iLength++;
00542         }
00543         
00544         if ((iStart >= getSize()) || (iLength == 0))
00545             ba.setSize(0);
00546         else
00547         {
00548             ba.setSize(iLength);
00549             ba.copy(0, *this, iStart, iLength);
00550         }
00551         
00552         return ba;
00553 }

00555 char AffxByteArray::parseChar()
00556 {
00557         if (getLength() > 0) {return getAt(0);}
00558         else return 0;
00559 }
00560 
00561 // Convert the byte array into an int value.
00562 int AffxByteArray::parseInt()
00563 {
00564         int iIndex = 0;
00565         char buffer[64];
00566         short i = 0;
00567 
00568         trim();
00569         int iSize = getSize();
00570 
00571         while ((iIndex < iSize) && (i < 63) && ((isdigit(getAt(iIndex))) || (getAt(iIndex) == '-')))
00572         {
00573                 buffer[i] = (char)(getAt(iIndex));
00574                 iIndex++;
00575                 i++;
00576         }
00577         buffer[i] = '\0';
00578         int iResult = atol(buffer);
00579         AffxByteArray ba;
00580         ba.append(iResult);
00581         return iResult;
00582 }
00583 
00584 bool AffxByteArray::parsebool()
00585 {
00586         bool b = false;
00587     toLowerCase();
00588     trimTabs();
00589         if ((equals("1")) || (equals("y")) || (equals("yes")) || (equals("true")) || (equals("t"))) {b = true;}
00590         else if ((equals("")) || (equals("0")) || (equals("n")) || (equals("no")) || (equals("false")) || (equals("f"))) {b = false;}
00591         return b;
00592 }
00593 
00594 AffxByteArray& AffxByteArray::trimTabs()
00595 {
00596     int i = 0;
00597     int iStart = 0;
00598     int iEnd = getSize();
00599 
00600     for (i = 0; (i < getSize()); i++)
00601     {
00602         if (getAt(i) <= ' ') {iStart++;}
00603         else {break;}
00604     }
00605 
00606     for (i = (getSize() - 1); (i >= 0); i--)
00607     {
00608         if (getAt(i) <= ' ') {iEnd--;}
00609         else {break;}
00610     }
00611     
00612     int iLength = iEnd - iStart;
00613     if (iLength <= 0)
00614     {
00615         setSize(0);
00616     }
00617     else
00618     {
00619             copy(0, *this, iStart, iLength); 
00620             setSize(iLength);
00621     }
00622 
00623         return *this;
00624 }
00625 
00626 AffxByteArray& AffxByteArray::trim()
00627 {   
00628     int i = 0;
00629     int iStart = 0;
00630     int iEnd = getSize();
00631     int iLength = 0;
00632     
00633     for (i = 0; (i < getSize()); i++)
00634     {
00635         if ((getAt(i) <= 32) && (getAt(i) != 9))
00636             iStart++;
00637         else
00638             break;  
00639     }
00640     
00641     for (i = (getSize() - 1); (i >= 0); i--)
00642     {
00643         if ((getAt(i) <= 32) && (getAt(i) != 9))
00644             iEnd--;
00645         else
00646             break;  
00647     }
00648     
00649     iLength = iEnd - iStart;
00650     if (iLength <= 0)
00651     {
00652         setSize(0);
00653     }
00654     else
00655     {
00656             copy(0, *this, iStart, iLength); 
00657             setSize(iLength);
00658     }
00659 
00660         return *this;
00661 }
00662 
00663 AffxString AffxByteArray::toString()
00664 {
00665         AffxString str;
00666 
00667         if (getSize() > 0)
00668         {
00669                 char *psz = (char *)malloc(getSize() + 1);
00670 #ifdef WIN32
00671                 strncpy_s(psz, getSize() + 1, (char *)getData(), getSize());
00672 #else
00673                 strncpy(psz, (char *)getData(), getSize());
00674 #endif
00675                 psz[getSize()] = 0;
00676                 str = psz;
00677                 free(psz);
00678         }
00679 
00680         return str;
00681 }

00683 bool AffxByteArray::startsWith(const AffxString& strCompare)
00684 {
00685         bool bStartsWith = false;
00686         int iCompareLength = strCompare.getLength();
00687 
00688         if (getSize() >= iCompareLength)
00689         {
00690                 bStartsWith = true;
00691                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iCompareLength); iIndex++)
00692                 {
00693                         if (getAt(iIndex) != strCompare.getAt(iIndex))
00694                         {
00695                                 bStartsWith = false;
00696                                 break;
00697                         }
00698                 }
00699         }
00700 
00701         return bStartsWith;
00702 }
00703 
00704 AffxString AffxByteArray::substring(int iIndex, int iEndIndex)
00705 {
00706         AffxByteArray ba;
00707 
00708         if (iEndIndex == -1)
00709                 iEndIndex = getSize();
00710 
00711         int iLength = iEndIndex - iIndex;
00712         if (iLength < 0)
00713                 iLength = 0;
00714 
00715         ba.setSize(iLength);
00716         ba.copy(0, *this, iIndex, iLength);
00717 
00718         return ba.toString();
00719 }
00720 
00721 AffxByteArray& AffxByteArray::toLowerCase()
00722 {
00723         int iCount = getSize();
00724         char by = 0;
00725         int iOffset = 'a' - 'A';
00726 
00727         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iCount); iIndex++)
00728         {
00729                 by = getAt(iIndex);
00730                 if ((by >= 'A') && (by <= 'Z'))
00731                 {
00732                         by += iOffset;
00733                         setAt(iIndex, by);
00734                 }
00735         }
00736 
00737         return *this;
00738 }
00739 
00740 AffxByteArray& AffxByteArray::toUpperCase()
00741 {
00742         int iCount = getSize();
00743         char by = 0;
00744         int iOffset = 'a' - 'A';
00745 
00746         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iCount); iIndex++)
00747         {
00748                 by = getAt(iIndex);
00749                 if ((by >= 'a') && (by <= 'z'))
00750                 {
00751                         by -= iOffset;
00752                         setAt(iIndex, by);
00753                 }
00754         }
00755 
00756         return *this;
00757 }
00758 
00759 void AffxByteArray::trimInternal()
00760 {
00761         int iCount = getSize();
00762         char by = 0;
00763 
00764         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iCount); iIndex++)
00765         {
00766                 by = getAt(iIndex);
00767         if (by <= 32)
00768                 {
00769                         copy(iIndex, *this, (iIndex + 1), (iCount - (iIndex + 1)));
00770                         iCount--;
00771                 }
00772         }
00773 
00774         setSize(iCount);
00775 }
00776 
00777 AffxString AffxByteArray::firstWord(int iOffset)
00778 {
00779     int iIndex = 0;
00780     AffxByteArray ba;
00781     
00782     iIndex = iOffset;
00783         int iStartIndex = 0;
00784         int iNewSize = 0;
00785         int iCount = getSize();
00786     if (iOffset < iCount)
00787     {
00788         while ((iIndex < iCount) && (getAt(iIndex) <= 32))
00789             iIndex++;
00790 
00791                 iStartIndex = iIndex;
00792                 
00793         while ((iIndex < iCount) && (getAt(iIndex) > 32))
00794         {
00795             iIndex++;
00796                         iNewSize++;
00797         }
00798 
00799                 ba.setSize(iNewSize);
00800                 ba.copy(0, *this, iStartIndex, iNewSize);
00801     }
00802     
00803     return ba.toString();
00804 }
00805     
00806 AffxByteArray AffxByteArray::reverseComplement()
00807 {
00808         AffxByteArray ba = *this;
00809     AffxString strComplement = "tvghefcdijmlknopqysaabwxrz";
00810     char by = 0;
00811         int iCount = getSize();
00812         int iIndex = 0;
00813     
00814     ba.toLowerCase();
00815     if (((iCount / 2) * 2) != iCount)
00816     {
00817                 iIndex = (iCount / 2);
00818         ba.setAt(iIndex, strComplement.getAt(ba.getAt(iIndex) - 'a'));
00819     }
00820     
00821     for (int i = 0; (i < (iCount / 2)); i++)
00822     {
00823                 iIndex = (iCount - i - 1);
00824         by = ba.getAt(i);
00825         ba.setAt(i, strComplement.getAt(ba.getAt(iIndex) - 'a'));
00826         ba.setAt(iIndex, strComplement.getAt(by - 'a'));
00827     }
00828 
00829         return ba;
00830 }  
00831   
00832 double AffxByteArray::parseDouble()
00833 {
00834         trim();
00835         double d = atof(toString().c_str());
00836         if ((equals("1.#IND")) || (equals("-1.#IND")) || (equals("1.#QNAN")) || (equals("nan"))) {d = numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00837         if ((equals("1.#INF")) || (equals("Inf")) || (equals("inf"))) {d = numeric_limits<double>::infinity();}
00838         if ((equals("-1.#INF")) || (equals("-Inf")) || (equals("-inf"))) {d = -numeric_limits<double>::infinity();}
00839         return d;
00840 }

00862 bool AffxByteArray::nextLine(AffxByteArray& ba)
00863 {
00864         bool bSuccessful = false;
00865         int iLength = 0;
00866         ba.setSize(255);
00867         int iStart = m_iOffset;
00868         int iIndex = m_iOffset;
00869 
00870         if (getSize() > 0)
00871         {
00872             int i = 0;
00873             int iLast = 0;
00874 
00875             while ((iIndex < getSize()) && ((i = (int)m_pData[iIndex]) != '\n') && ((i = (int)m_pData[iIndex]) != '\r'))
00876             {
00877                 iIndex++;
00878                 iLast = i;
00879             }
00880                 if ((i == '\r') && ((iIndex + 1) < getSize()) && ((int)m_pData[iIndex + 1] == '\n'))
00881                 {
00882                         iIndex++;
00883                         iLast = i;
00884                         i = '\n';
00885                 }
00886             iLength = iIndex - iStart;
00887             m_iOffset += (iLength + 1);
00888             bool bRemoveLastByte = ((i == '\n') && (iLast == '\r'));
00889             bSuccessful = getLine(iStart, iIndex, iLength, ba, bRemoveLastByte);
00890             ba.m_iOffset = 0;
00891         }
00892 
00893     return bSuccessful;
00894 }

00896 bool AffxByteArray::isValid(bool bParameterFile)
00897 {
00898     bool bValid = false;
00899         trim();
00900         if (getLength() > 0)
00901         {
00902             if (!bParameterFile) {bValid = true;}
00903             else if (getAt(0) != ';') {bValid = true;} // ';'
00904         }
00905 
00906         return bValid;
00907 }
00908 
00909 bool AffxByteArray::getLine(int iStart, int iIndex, int iLength, AffxByteArray& ba, bool bRemoveLastByte)
00910 {
00911         bool bSuccessful = false;
00912 
00913         if ((iIndex >= getSize()) && (iLength == 0))
00914         {
00915             ba.setSize(0);
00916         }
00917         else
00918         {
00919             bSuccessful = true;
00920 
00921             if (bRemoveLastByte)
00922             {
00923                 if (iLength > 0)
00924                 {
00925                     iLength--;
00926                 }
00927             }
00928 
00929             ba.setSize(iLength);
00930                 memcpy((void*)(ba.m_pData), (void*)(m_pData + iStart), iLength);
00931             //System.arraycopy(value, iStart, ba.value, 0, iLength);
00932         }
00933 
00934         return bSuccessful;
00935 }
00936 
00937 AffxString AffxByteArray::getWord(int iWordIndex)
00938 {
00939     int iIndex = 0;
00940     int iOffset = 0;
00941     int iWordFound = 0;
00942     AffxByteArray ba;
00943     
00944     iIndex = iOffset;
00945     while ((iIndex < length()) && (iWordFound < iWordIndex))
00946     {
00947         while ((iIndex < length()) && (getAt(iIndex) <= 32))
00948             iIndex++;
00949         
00950         ba.setSize(0);
00951         if (iIndex < length())
00952             iWordFound++;
00953             
00954         while ((iIndex < length()) && (getAt(iIndex) > 32))
00955         {
00956             ba.append(getAt(iIndex)); 
00957             iIndex++;
00958         }
00959     }
00960     
00961     if (iWordFound < iWordIndex)
00962         ba.setSize(0);
00963         
00964     return ba.toString();
00965 }
00966 
00967 int AffxByteArray::append(char by)
00968 {
00969         int nOldSize = m_nSize;
00970         setSize(m_nSize + 1);
00971 
00972         memcpy(m_pData + nOldSize, &by, 1 * sizeof(char));
00973 
00974         return nOldSize;
00975 }

00977 int AffxByteArray::parameterCount()
00978 {
00979     int iIndex = 0;
00980     int iOffset = 0;
00981     int iWordFound = 0;
00982         bool bQuotedWord = false;
00983 
00984     iIndex = iOffset;
00985     while ((iIndex < getLength()))
00986     {
00987         while ((iIndex < getLength()) && (getAt(iIndex) <= ' '))
00988         {
00989             iIndex++;
00990         }
00991 
00992                 if ((iIndex < getLength()) && (!bQuotedWord))
00993                 {
00994                         if (getAt(iIndex) == '"') {bQuotedWord = true; iIndex++;}
00995                         if (iIndex < getLength())
00996                         {
00997                                 iWordFound++;
00998                         }
00999                 }
01000 
01001         while ((iIndex < getLength()) && (getAt(iIndex) > ' '))
01002         {
01003             iIndex++;
01004         }
01005                 if (((iIndex - 1) < getLength()) && (getAt(iIndex - 1) == '"')) {bQuotedWord = false;}
01006     }
01007 
01008     return iWordFound;
01009 }

01053

01055     while ((iIndex < getLength()) && (iWordFound < iWordIndex))
01056     {

01058             iIndex++;
01059 
01060                 if ((iIndex < getLength()) && (!bQuotedWord))
01061                 {
01062                         if (getAt(iIndex) == '"') {bQuotedWord = true; iIndex++;}
01063                         ba.setSize(0);
01064                         if (iIndex < getLength()) {iWordFound++;}
01065                 }
01066                 if (!bQuotedWord)

01077                         {
01078                                 if (((iIndex + 1) < getLength()) && (getAt(iIndex) == '"') && (getAt(iIndex + 1) <= 32)) {bQuotedWord = false; iIndex++; break;}
01079                                 if (((iIndex + 1) == getLength()) && (getAt(iIndex) == '"')) {bQuotedWord = false; iIndex++; break;}
01080                                 ba.append(m_pData[iIndex]);
01081                                 iIndex++;
01082                         }
01083                 }
01084     }
01085 
01086     if (iWordFound < iWordIndex)
01087         ba.setSize(0);
01088 
01089     return ba;

01280 // This function is used by AffxArray for sorting and searching.
01281 int AffxByteArray::compareTo(AffxByteArray obj, int iCompareCode)
01282 {
01283         int iCompareResult = 0;
01284         AffxByteArray objThat = obj;
01285         int iThis = 0;
01286         int iThat = 0;
01287         switch(iCompareCode)
01288         {
01289         case 0:
01290             iCompareResult = compareTo(objThat);
01291             break;
01292         case 1: 
01293                 iThis = parseInt();
01294                 iThat = obj.parseInt();
01295                 if (iThis > iThat)
01296                         iCompareResult = 1;
01297                 else if (iThis < iThat)
01298                         iCompareResult = -1;
01299                 else
01300                         iCompareResult = 0;
01301 
01302                 break;
01303         }
01304 
01305         return iCompareResult;
01306 }
01307 
01308 int AffxByteArray::compareTo(AffxByteArray that)
01309 {
01310     int iResult = 0;
01311         int iLength = __minimum(this->m_nSize, that.m_nSize);
01312 
01313         bool bEqual = true;
01314         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iLength); iIndex++)
01315         {
01316             if (this->m_pData[iIndex] != that.m_pData[iIndex])
01317             {
01318                 bEqual = false;
01319                 iResult = (this->m_pData[iIndex] - that.m_pData[iIndex]);
01320                 break;
01321             }
01322         }
01323         if (bEqual) {iResult = (this->m_nSize - that.m_nSize);}
01324 
01325         return iResult;
01326 }
01327 
01328 int AffxByteArray::compareTo(AffxString that)
01329 {
01330     int iResult = 0;
01331         int iLength = __minimum(this->m_nSize, (int)that.length());
01332 
01333         bool bEqual = true;
01334         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iLength); iIndex++)
01335         {
01336             if (this->m_pData[iIndex] != that.charAt(iIndex))
01337             {
01338                 bEqual = false;
01339                 iResult = (this->m_pData[iIndex] - that.charAt(iIndex));
01340                 break;
01341             }
01342         }
01343         if (bEqual) {iResult = (this->m_nSize - (int)that.length());}
01344 
01345         return iResult;
01346 }

01355 
01356 void AffxByteArray::replace(const AffxString& str1, const AffxString& str2)
01357 {
01358         AffxString str1Temp = str1;
01359         AffxByteArray ba;
01360         int iIndex = indexOf(str1Temp);
01361         while (iIndex != -1)
01362         {
01363                 ba.setSize(0);
01364                 ba.append(substring(0, iIndex));
01365                 ba.append(str2);
01366                 ba.append(substring(iIndex + (int)str1Temp.length()));
01367                 assign(ba.toString());
01368                 iIndex = indexOf(str1Temp);
01369         }
01370 }

01372 bool AffxByteArray::isAllWhitespace()

01381 
01382 int AffxByteArray::getMaxRun(char byBase)
01383 {
01384         int iCurrentRun = 0;
01385         int iMaxRun = 0;
01386         for (int iBaseIndex = 0; (iBaseIndex < getLength()); iBaseIndex++)
01387         {
01388                 if (getAt(iBaseIndex) == byBase) {iCurrentRun++;}
01389                 else
01390                 {
01391                         if (iCurrentRun > iMaxRun) {iMaxRun = iCurrentRun;}
01392                         if (getAt(iBaseIndex) == byBase) {iCurrentRun = 1;}
01393                         else {iCurrentRun = 0;}
01394                 }
01395         }
01396         if (iCurrentRun > iMaxRun) {iMaxRun = iCurrentRun;}
01397         return (iMaxRun);
01398 }
01399 
01400 int AffxByteArray::getCountInWindow(char byBase, int iWindowSize)
01401 {
01402     int iBestCount = 0;
01403     int iCount = 0;
01404         iWindowSize = __minimum(iWindowSize, getLength());
01405     for (int iBaseIndex = 0; (iBaseIndex <= (getLength() - iWindowSize)); iBaseIndex++)
01406     {
01407         iCount = 0;
01408         for (int iWindowOffset = 0; (iWindowOffset < iWindowSize); iWindowOffset++)
01409         {
01410                         if (getAt(iBaseIndex + iWindowOffset) == byBase) {iCount++;}
01411         }
01412         if (iCount > iBestCount) {iBestCount = iCount;}
01413     }
01414     return (iBestCount);
01415 }
01416 
01417 int AffxByteArray::getCount(char byBase)
01418 {
01419         int iCount = 0;
01420         for (int iBaseIndex = 0; (iBaseIndex < getLength()); iBaseIndex++)
01421         {
01422                 if (getAt(iBaseIndex) == byBase) {iCount++;}
01423         }
01424         return (iCount);
